document_data.name: Manxam
document_data.mainbody: '''Manxam''' ({{Pronounce|MANK|zam|refs= He was the most prominent of the exiled beholders of [[Ooltul]].
document_data.Personality: Manxam was considered to be very reasonable in comparison to other beholders. He was willing to work with humans, so long as doing so was advantageous, and was known to be particularly friendly towards [[priest]]s of [[Bane]].
document_data.Possessions: Manxam was known to possess a ''[[helm of telepathy]]'' that had been altered so as to allow it to fit on his body.
document_data.History:
Manxam was barely involved in the hunt for [[Shandril Shessair]] when she attacked [[Zhentil Keep]]. He preferred [[Fzoul Chembryl]] as leader of the [[Zhentarim]] over [[Manshoon]].

In later years he supported Fzoul in his schemes contributing to the downfall of Manshoon.

Sometime before [[1374 DR]], Manxam was sponsored by the Zhentarim to hunt down and assassinate [[Avagard]] the Black, a minor Zhentil Keep nobleman turned pirate king of the Moonsea. Manxam led a squad of beholders to the pirate's ship where they left nothing behind but ash.

As of [[1489 DR]], Manxam appeared to be among the senior leadership of [[Darkhold]], then-headquarters of the Zhentarim.
